FAQS

Top Questions Our Web Design Agency Is Asked

How much does your web design agency charge for a website?

 

The cost to build a website can vary greatly depending on the complexity of the software, the features and functionality required, the level of customization, and the experience of the development team. An essential website could cost anywhere from $25,000 to $75,000, while a more complex and feature-rich platform could cost upwards of $200,000 or more.

It is important to work with a reputable and experienced development team that can provide a detailed proposal outlining the project, the scope of work, and associated costs. It is also important to consider ongoing maintenance and support costs, as well as any additional fees for hosting and infrastructure.

Overall, the cost to build a website should be viewed as an investment in the long-term success of the business.

Our average website rebuild averages $75,000-$150,000. This is a one-time, fixed-fee cost that includes the following:

  • Digital Strategy
  • UI/UX Design
  • Full-Stack Web Development
  • Copywriting
  • Graphic + Asset Creation
  • Data Entry + Migration
  • Technical SEO Optimization
  • Analytics + Goal Setup
  • UI/UX Guidelines
  • Editors Guidelines
  • Full Ownership of Design + Development
  • Upon Completion
  • 2 Weeks Post-Launch Support

 

What Determines the Price of a Website Design?

When it comes to getting a custom quote for professional website design services, several factors play into the price.

The cost of a website design is based on the following factors:

  • The website’s complexity: A more complex website with custom functionalities and features typically takes more time and effort to design.
  • The number of pages: The more pages a website has, the more time and effort each page will require to design.
  • The level of customization: A customized website with unique layouts, graphics, and branding elements will be more expensive than a template-based design.
  • The timeframe for completion: A shorter deadline for completing the website design can require your designers to work longer hours, increasing the project’s cost.
  • Additional services. Services like website hosting, video production, SEO, and ongoing maintenance can add to the overall cost of your website design project.

Multiple landing pages with complex navigation may require more design or coding time than creating only a few simple brochure-style pages.

Additional touches are good to help attract and convert site visitors: suitable for website and web design agencies ranked copywriting, photography, app development, and search engine optimization.

When creating digital experiences, the ultimate goal should be optimized for both performance and usability. While a CMS can assist in keeping the site organized and easy to maintain, ensuring it is optimized for search engines (national or local SEO) adds even more time and effort. All of these components come together to form the final cost for your website development project.

How to Calculate the Cost of Your Website Design Using Our Project Calculator

If you’re considering a new website design, it can be difficult to determine exactly how much your project will cost. Luckily, our project calculator makes the estimating process simple and easy with its intuitive design.

With our project calculator, you can accurately determine the cost of your website design. All you need to do is provide basic information, such as:

  • What kind of website do you want? Are you looking for an ecommerce web design, or do you need WordPress web design for a service business?
  • What kind of services do you need? (Developing a cohesive website strategy, creating UX/UI designs tailored to your target audience, crafting engaging and effective copywriting for Shopify or WordPressweb, video, or animation)
  • What kind of features do you need for your website? (From news feeds to user walls and social media marketing features, we’ve got you covered.)

We have developed a comprehensive step-by-step breakdown, tailoring each element of the web design and website development process to reflect your budget and specific goals.

What types of companies do you work with?

 

Our typical customer is a mid-market business making $25-$250m / year.

We most often work in the following industries:

  • Construction
  • Education
  • FinTech
  • Healthcare
  • Professional Services
  • Retail + Consumer Goods
  • SaaS

How long does it take your agency to build a website?

 

The timeline for completing a project depends on several factors such as the complexity of the new website itself, the scope of work required, and how quickly you are able to provide feedback throughout the discovery phase of the process. Typically, projects can range from 4-8 months or longer if there are complex features or integrations needed.

What results should I expect?

 

Results will vary based on specific goals and your industry.

However, on average, our websites…

  • Are effective for 56% longer
  • Convert 82% better
  • Create a 24% lift in organic search results

Do you offer support after the website has launched?

 

Yes!

Our website support team is dedicated to providing the highest customer service. We understand that you rely on your website functioning smoothly 100% of the time, so we are here to ensure it does!

From resolving technical issues to regularly updating the look and feel of your website, our website support services include the following:

  1. Data and analytics
  2. UX audits
  3. Website maintenance
  4. Landing page design
  5. Conversion rate optimization
  6. A/B testing
  7. Multivariant testing
  8. Website migration
  9. Split testing
  10. Page speed optimization
  11. Monthly reporting

A website revamp can help ensure that a company’s online presence is prepared for success. Our website redesign services prioritize user experience, web and mobile compatibility, higher engagement rates, improved search engine rankings, creative content displays, and more.

A transparent collaboration

Creating a responsive web design that stands out takes careful coordination. We work with clients to develop visual identities and align their brand message with the right aesthetic. To ensure that our entire web design process succeeds in hitting those targets, you can work side-by-side with our creative team to ensure your website aligns with your brand guidelines.

From the initial wireframes to the fully customized landing page, you will have the opportunity to weigh in on each decision and provide feedback along the way. So when your website publishes, it perfectly aligns with your brand’s goals and objectives.

Future-proofing your website

Building a successful business involves much more than having a well-designed website. It requires advanced insights into customer experiences, online marketing strategies, and technology trends to ensure that expectations are met and exceeded. That’s why many companies turn to us when they need a website redesign.

We’ve worked with more than one hundred brands over 10 years. We use that experience to predict and incorporate future needs into your website redesign.

For The Extra Curious

How do I find a professional web design company?

 

1. Network Referrals For Web Design Companies

Contacting colleagues should be your first step when looking for a web design firm. Past positive experiences from someone you know will speak volumes, and hopefully, provide you with some peace of mind.

However, you shouldn’t stop there. We urge you to proceed with steps 2 and 3 to find the right web design agency.

 

2. Conduct A Local Online Search For Web Design Agencies

Believe it or not, turning to Google for your web agency search isn’t a bad idea. Tons of local companies possess the skills necessary to make your website a success, and the best will be taking the time to optimize their sites for search engines. Use this to help develop a shortlist.

 

3. Website Design Agency Review Sites

There are dozens of third-party review sites that rank top web design agencies.

Review sites like Clutch.co and DesignRush are great ways to not only find the top web design companies and agencies but vet the top web design agencies and companies you’ve collected in the previous two steps. Here you can see reviews from past clients and overall understand how they rank in the top website design agencies and firm ecosystem.

Where are the best web design companies located?

 

It’s 2023. There’s talent everywhere.

Generally speaking though, larger cities such as New York, LA, San Francisco, London, and Toronto attract talented web design companies, thus in general you’ll see leading web development companies and leading web design agencies, in these regions dominating the best web design agency lists.

Where should I look online to find the best web design agencies?

 

These awards are given to websites that have been recognized for their outstanding design, usability, creativity, and content. Clutch.co focuses on the user experience, Awwwards looks for innovation and design excellence, The FWA awards a web designer or agency for their technical achievements, CSSDA awards sites for their coding and development, and the Webby Awards recognize websites for their overall excellence. All of these awards are highly sought after by professional web designers and developers, and winning one of these awards can be a great boost to a website or creative digital agency’s reputation.

Generally speaking, the best web design companies will frequently show up on these websites.

How do I create a web design RFP that attracts the best web design agencies?

 

Creating a web design RFP that attracts the best web design agencies begins with outlining your requirements. After you’ve defined your goals, it’s time to start thinking about the specific requirements for your new website. This is where you’ll get into the nitty-gritty details of what you need, including things like how many pages the site should have, which features it should include, what type of content will be on each page, and any other specific details that are important to your web design project. The more specific you can be here, the better. This will help ensure that the web design agencies you contact have all the information they need to provide you with the best possible quote and design for your website.

How do I know the web design company is the right fit for my web project?

 

How To Evaluate The Work Of A Professional Website Design Agency?

When evaluating the work of a professional web designer or design agency, it is important to ask yourself if the design facilitates the site’s purpose by making it easy for visitors to browse the site and take the desired action. For example, on an ecommerce site, the design should encourage visitors to check out products. Additionally, other factors to consider include whether the site has been optimized for SEO, including page loading time and keywords, if the content placed on the site is relevant for the audience, and the responsiveness of the website, such as if it works with different browsers and mobiles.

The best web design agencies will be able to demonstrate mastery across all of the areas above.

What Interview Questions Should I Ask Website Design Firms?

Figuring out what services an agency offers, or a general sense of their portfolio should be easy. If it’s not, you most likely should not engage them in conversation.

When you get to the stage where you’re starting to interview agencies, you should go a little deeper to understand not only what they can do, but why they do it, and what motivates them to do it.

Ask questions like:

  • How do you learn more about our company?
  • How do you ensure each of your projects is a success?
  • What level of involvement is expected from us?
  • What key team members from the design agency will be involved?
  • Is there any ownership oversight?
  • What happens if someone on my project team leaves?
  • Are there any third-party dependencies required to build our website that we should know?
  • How do you approach performance optimization?
  • How do you approach ADA compliance?
  • What will happen if the project runs over schedule?

Answering these questions can help you find the right professional website and best web design company, for your needs. It is important to research each of the best web design company thoroughly, looking at their portfolio, customer reviews, and any other relevant information to help you make an informed decision.

Additionally, be sure to ask questions about their experience and the services they offer, as well as their pricing structure and timeline for completion. With the right research and questions, you can find the perfect web design professional digital marketing services company for your project.

What to do once you hire a website design agency?

 

Once you’ve hired a web design company, you should expect the creative and best web design agency itself to provide you with clear next steps. (If they don’t, it’s a big red flag)

In general, though, some things you can do on your side to be prepared are:

  • Gather any branding guidelines you may have
  • Gather any editorial guidelines you may have
  • Gather any photography or collateral you have
  • Make sure you have access information to things such as your website, web server, and web hosting
  • Make sure all key stakeholders are aware of the project, and the potential involvement that may be required of them

 

How Can I (The Client) Help You To Build A Better Website?

Approaching the project as a willing participant is a great start. We need to know much about your business to create the best outcomes.

Being organized, responsive, and honest with your opinions will go a long, long way.

How does Jorbanapproach managing clients and projects?

 

What is your process for designing a website?

We meet with you to understand your business goals and the performance of your current website. We’ll formulate an action plan for a custom website revamp to generate leads and sales for your business.

Here are the steps we take with you to redesign your website:

  1. Create a benchmark of your business website’s performance before the redesign so we can compare how much better our redesign is later on.
  2. Identify the goals that we want to achieve with a website redesign.
  3. Define what your brand stands for and what your brand message is.
  4. Define your target audience and their pain points so we can create effective graphic design, visual elements, and content that will capture their attention and inspire action.
  5. Conduct a competitor analysis to identify opportunities for improvement of the market strategy.
  6. Choose the right content management system to keep up with the ever-changing digital media landscape and user demands. We build custom websites on Shopify, WordPress, Hubspot, Drupal, and more! Each site is built with a responsive design.

 

 

What Kind Of Timeline Do You Typically Work On For Web Design Projects?

Our own web development agency primarily works with mid-sized businesses, and our typical web design project takes 6-9 months to complete. This timeframe is necessary for us to do adequate research, planning, design, development, and quality assurance to deliver a high-quality custom website.

 

How Long Does It Take To Build A Website From Scratch?

Similar to the pricing question, it’s not always straightforward how long it will take to build a website from scratch. Things will vary greatly based on overall requirements.

For a small, straightforward website expect 2-3 months.

For a more complex site, typically required by most mid-sized to enterprise-level businesses, anticipate a timeline of 6-12 months.

 

What Will Happen If The Web Project Runs Over Schedule?

Custom web design can sometimes throw out surprises, even if on the surface it appears to be straightforward.
Depending on the circumstances, the following measures will be taken:

  1. Acknowledgment of the delay as early as possible by your project manager
  2. Pairing down complicated features, or batching features in multiple releases
  3. Adding additional agency personnel to the project to accelerate the rate of design and development

What web services do you offer?

 

Do You Have Any Experience With Ecommerce Businesses?

Yes, our branding agency has worked with many ecommerce and social media marketing businesses over the years. You can learn more about branding agency and our ecommerce experience here.

 

Do You Have Experience Creating Responsive Or Mobile-Friendly Websites?

We’ve been building mobile-friendly websites since 2011.

Responsive design is a great way to ensure that websites are optimized for all screen sizes, allowing users to navigate and access the content they are looking for easily.

For our B2B websites, desktop tends to rein supreme still, so we typically adopt a desktop-to-mobile approach.
For our Ecommerce websites, a mobile-first approach is more common.

 

What Consulting Services Do You Offer?

We offer a full range of consulting services to help you with your custom-made website projects. These services include keyword research, market analysis, custom development, and content strategy.

These services can be an excellent resource for your business, as they can help you with more than just the website design and development of your website.

They can provide valuable insights into the best strategies for your website, as well as help you create a comprehensive plan to ensure your website is successful. With the help of the best website design companies, you can be sure that your website will be a success.

How is web design different from web development?

 

Website design is the art and science of creating visually appealing and user-friendly websites that engage your visitors and encourage them to take action. It involves a combination of technical and creative skills, as well as a deep understanding of your customers and the user experience.

Design is an integral part of building a website. Our web designers focus on the following to create great user experiences:

  • A website’s code
  • User experience (UX) elements
  • A site’s appearance
  • Site architecture and navigation
  • Website content

Website redesign involves optimizing an existing website that may be outdated or perform poorly.

At Jorban, we can help you with creating a new website or redesigning an existing one. We provide web design services for SaaS companies, ecommerce brands, large enterprises, nonprofits, and many other organizations. We’re a top web design agency focusing on original, custom website builds for corporations, small businesses, and nonprofits. We have been designing websites for over a decade, and we’d love to create a responsive website that generates revenue for your organization.

Does good design really matter?

 

Good website design is the digital face of your brand, and it plays a vital role in creating the right impression on your visitors. A well-designed website not only elevates the user experience but also boosts credibility, fosters trust, and ultimately drives conversions.

We craft tailored website designs that resonate with your audience, encapsulate your brand’s essence, and streamline user navigation. Our dedicated team of creative professionals works hand-in-hand with you to create visually appealing, mobile-responsive, and lightning-fast websites that deliver an unparalleled user experience.

  • A professionally designed website will help make a great first impression on your visitors and can help establish trust and credibility with your potential customers.
  • Good website design can ensure that your site is easy to navigate, has clear calls to action, and is optimized for mobile devices.
  • We will ensure your website is search engine optimized, which will make it easier for potential customers to find you online.
  • A well-designed website can differentiate your business from your competitors. We will help you communicate your unique value proposition to your customers.
  • Our team of web designers will help you develop a consistent brand identity across your website, social media, and other digital channels.
  • We will save you time and money in the long run by ensuring that your site is optimized for conversions and driving revenue.
  • Our website design services will help you stay current with the latest design trends and technologies.

Our cutting-edge website design services can improve your website traffic, image, sales, or messaging.

What’s the difference between web design, website redesign, and a refresh?

 

Web design involves all aspects of your site’s user experience, aesthetic, and front-end functionality. Website design can be applied to a new site or an existing one. When applied to an existing website, we refer to it as a “website redesign.” Website redesign is thus a subset of website design.

The terms “website redesign” and “website refresh” are often used synonymously, but we distinguish between the two.

  • Website redesign: an in-depth change to multiple aspects of the site, resulting in substantial differences in the website’s appearance, user experience, performance, and underlying code.
  • Website refresh: a refresh is more cosmetic in nature than a redesign and could include updated fonts, an updated color scheme, limited user experience updates (for example, a button that gets a new shape), and other minor improvements.

How do I create a website design project plan?

 

When we build websites, we always start with a project plan. Your Jorbanproject manager uses the project plan to ensure that goals are clear, tasks are assigned and tracked, and everyone involved in the project is kept up to date.

Here are some of the many things we focus on when creating a project plan, whether working with a startup, a nonprofit, or a Fortune 100 company.

  1. The site needs to be optimized for conversions. Doesn’t matter whether it’s an ecommerce store or a B2B website, conversions are the lifeblood of your business.
  2. Site structure is everything. We build the optimal site architecture with intuitive navigation.
  3. Your value proposition must stand out and be communicated. Everything in the design needs to serve this purpose.
  4. The site needs to exude authority and credibility to your target audience. What resonates with middle-class teenage girls won’t exactly speak to business executives, and vice versa. We ensure your site aligns with your branding strategy and exudes authority and credibility for your ideal customer.
  5. When designing ecommerce websites, we focus on reducing cart abandonment rates and increasing conversions.
  6. For SaaS websites, we craft user-centric interfaces that simplify software adoption and enhance customer engagement.
  7. When we work with charitable organizations, we focus on impactful nonprofit websites that amplify an organization’s cause, promote awareness, and drive donations.
  8. For agencies, we design distinctive online portfolios that showcase your expertise and attract ideal clients.
  9. When engaging with large corporate clients, we develop scalable enterprise websites that elevate a company’s image, streamline business processes, and foster collaboration.
  10. For our business-to-business clients, we create compelling B2B website designs that cultivate professional relationships and drive lead generation.
  11. When designing small business websites, we focus on eye-catching websites that establish a business’s online presence and boost local visibility.
  12. We love working with startups to design a website that will drive demo requests and perform flawlessly.

What’s Jorban’s web design process?

 

When you engage with Jorban, you’re embarking on a collaborative journey. In our initial meeting, we’ll discuss your business objectives and website vision. Together, we’ll develop a tailored, web design and development strategy focused on driving leads and sales for your enterprise.

Here are the stages of our website design process:

  1. Pre-kickoff: We’ll get to know each other, and begin to understand your target audience and their pain points so we can create effective graphic design, visual elements, and content that will capture their attention and inspire action. We’ll also learn more about your brand, business, content management system, and technical requirements.
  2. Kickoff: At the official start of the project; we’ll define all elements of the project scope and hold a workshop to define success, work on goal identification, and start thinking through structure, design, and development.
  3. Discovery: This is a critical step of web design. We’re digging deeper, combining notes from the kickoff with our own research and analytics. We build elements like personas, sitemaps, and wireframes, as well as other visual design documents. We’ll also set up weekly status meetings with you.
  4. Creative: We ensure we’re on the same page creatively through mood boards and concept designs. We then take those findings to build prototypes. In this phase of the web design process, we also design the website’s real-life interface.
  5. Development: Time to start coding and actually build the website! In the development phase of the website project, you can expect work on the front-end, back-end, and content management systems. Regular check-ins and early access to a staging server allow us to stay in sync with you.
  6. Pre-launch: We’re getting ready for the big day. That means extended testing of all features, bug fixes, fixing broken links, and other tweaks to make sure it’s just right. We’ll also schedule the launch and handover date with you.
  7. Launch: On the launch day, our website design and development project team is available to work on any last-minute fixes and adjustments. By the end of the day, you have a fully functioning, beautiful new website.
  8. Post-launch: We’ll work for at least 10 business days with you to fix any bugs or broken links, and to make routine tweaks. We’ll also chat with you on potential long-term engagements for ongoing support.

We build custom websites on Shopify, WordPress, Hubspot, Drupal, and more! Each Jorbansite is built with responsive design to function flawlessly across all devices.

 

Website Design Strategy

A top-notch website design goes hand-in-hand with a solid grasp of digital marketing as a whole. We’re pros at ensuring your website’s information architecture, messaging, SEO, design, and development come together to captivate visitors.

By keeping up with the latest research metrics and best practices, we can craft delightful user experiences that fuel success in achieving your inbound marketing goals. Let us help you create a website that not only looks great but also drives results.

UX and UI Design

UX/UI design is crucial to the success of any website. When creating a unique look and feel for your site, we’ll refer to your brand guidelines to ensure all visual elements, including colors, logos, graphics, and more, are perfectly cohesive with your company’s messaging, identity, and overall aesthetic.

We ensure the website is easy to navigate and all design elements reflect your brand, which will help craft a seamless user experience that customers can easily identify and interact with.

Website Development

In addition to being a full-service web design agency, we have full-stack web and software development capabilities. Focusing on website design and web development services has allowed us to become experts on the world’s leading web platforms.

Site speed, security, third-party integrations, SEO, and flexibility are paramount for mature businesses. Our designers and developers create customized solutions to address these needs and more. We pair website development with a keen eye for branding and graphic design.

What is a website design proposal?

 

A website design proposal is a clear statement of how you want your website to look-and what a custom web design would specifically accomplish.

For example, a website design proposal could cover any of the following:

  • We want a website with a user-friendly interface and excellent UX to achieve a low bounce rate.
  • Our target keywords are highly competitive, and we want to ensure that our new website performs optimally to gain a better search presence and capture organic traffic.
  • We’re launching a new brand and marketing campaign, and we want our website to reflect that.

Often, the best website design agencies, designers, and managers create a website design proposal to get buy-in from key executives who make financial decisions for the company.

What does a web design agency do?

 

A good web design agency creates modern and functional website frontend experiences. Using the latest design tools, an experienced creative web design agency team can build a creative, easy-to-use site that fits the company’s brand identity and meets customers’ expectations by carefully analyzing their needs and goals.

Web design agencies often do full planning, which includes working with developers to add things like content management systems, SEO optimization, and technical support. Clients can also use maintenance services after the site goes live to ensure it stays safe and secure. Using the skills and knowledge of a professional web design agency, businesses can create immersive user experiences that keep customers interested and boost their online presence.

A good web design agency will also work closely with your marketing department or external branding agencies to ensure the site elevates your brand and conforms to all brand guidelines.

How often should you redesign your website?

 

Consumer trends, browser technology, and accessibility requirements are always changing; there is no set schedule for redesigning your website. Rather, you should monitor how your current site performs and where it can be improved.

Examining your current website and your company’s goals regularly can help you find new ways to improve conversion rates (CRO) and user experience (UX) through a website redesign.

Who is the best website design company?

 

We are! (JK, but not really)

When it comes to finding the best website design company out there, there are a few variables that should be taken into consideration.

Look at the portfolio of websites they have designed to understand the level of quality they can bring to the project.

Check customer reviews and testimonials to understand the services the marketing agency provides, as well as any recommendations or suggestions from past clients.

Consider the timeline of projects and possible add-ons such as maintenance and support options. Knowing all these criteria will help you make an informed decision when selecting a top web design software development company that can give you the results you seek.

Do you offer services across the USA?

 

Whether you’re based in Washington, DC, San Francisco, New York, Denver, Houston, Chicago, Los Angeles, or anywhere else across the US, we can help you with custom, web design services and mobile app development. Our award-winning web design projects span the country, and we’re excited for you to join the ranks.
